result.title: End-of-project KGSIR on ERF developments
result.description: D1.3 (M48, CICERO, UNIVLEEDS, ULEI): End-of-project KGSIR on ERF developments, including time evolution, causes on diversity in ERF of CO2 and quantification of model errors, constrained ERF for aerosol-cloud interactions from models vs. observations after volcanic eruptions (Tasks. 1.1.1 and 1.1.3).
